requirements.title: Cardiology abnormal ECG alert
requirements.summary: Create an alert when an ECG result shows ST-elevation to notify on-call cardiologist.
requirements.notes: No details on cadence, thresholds, or who receives the alert.

requirements.title: Outpatient appointment reminders
requirements.summary: Add SMS reminders 48 hours before appointment for patients with cell phone on file.
requirements.notes: Not clear whether opt-in required and if translation needed.

support.title: User cannot log in to Hyperspace
support.symptoms: User reports invalid credentials after password reset

support.title: Interface ACK backlog
support.symptoms: HL7 interface queue has backup for lab results
